name: TT Games
info:
• 别名: Traveller's Tales
  • 别名: TT Fusion
  • 别名: TT Games Limited
  • 生日: 2005年
  • 母公司: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment (2007–present)
detail: TT Games Limited is a British holding company and a subsidiary of Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. The company was established in 2005 through the merger of developer Traveller's Tales and publisher Giant Interactive (now TT Games Publishing). Its other branches include developer TT Fusion, animation studio TT Animation and mobile game studios Playdemic and TT Odyssey. The company is best known for its video games based on the Lego construction toy.
